Capacity.title: Capacity
Capacity.description: Cooling tower capacity in terms of heat transfer rate of the cooling tower between air stream and water stream.

SumpHeaterPower.title: SumpHeaterPower
SumpHeaterPower.description: Electrical heat power of sump heater.

UACurve.title: UACurve
UACurve.description: UA value as a  function of fan speed at certain water flow rate, UA = f ( fan speed).

Performance.title: Performance
Performance.description: Water temperature change as a function of wet-bulb temperature, water entering temperature, water flow rate, air flow rate, Tdiff = f ( Twet-bulb, Twater,in, mwater, mair).
